doc.name: MultipleConceptIcon
doc.description: An icon that displays multiple concepts, in a set of rounded boxes, with the uppermost box containing the name of the set of concepts. This is designed to be used within an instance of ptolemy.data.ontologies.FlatTokenRepresentativeConcept.
doc.author: Ben Lickly, Edward A. Lee, Elizabeth Latronico, Charles Shelton
doc.property: The amount of translation to apply to the background figure. This is a double that defaults to 10.0.
